You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &apos;

== Value ==

`&apos;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0027/index.htm U+00027].
